category: AI Tools / Prompt Library / Configuration Repository
description: A curated GitHub repository containing custom chat modes, project instructions, and prompt templates for GitHub Copilot. Includes specialized behavioral configurations like 'Beast Mode' for GPT-4.1, DBA mode, planning mode, PRD creation, and more to customize AI agent behavior for specific workflows and domains.
primary_use: Customize GitHub Copilot agent behavior with pre-built chat modes, enhance AI performance for specialized tasks, share and discover community prompt engineering best practices

pros: Free and open source community resource
No vendor lock-in - simple text files
Educational resource for learning effective prompting
Supports multiple AI models and use cases
cons: May become outdated as AI models evolve
Requires understanding of prompt engineering to customize effectively
Some modes are model-specific (may not work with all AI versions)
Team members must remember to select appropriate mode
Can create inconsistency if different team members use different modes
